评论概述: I've worn it under a few different outfits and it looks great.
评论详情: It fits true to size, and I was happy with the quality. The material is soft and comfortable against my skin. I was a little worried about the lace being itchy, but it's not at all. I also appreciate that it held up well in the wash and didn't shrink or lose its shape. My only minor complaint is that the lace seems a tad delicate, so I'll be careful when I wash it.

I bought one in white and loved it so much I had to buy it in black also. The material is really thin which makes it great for layering but the material isn’t cheap. I thought I was gonna have to throw it away after accidentally getting it caught on a zipper, but after removing it carefully I realized it was still in perfect condition with no holes or loose fabric.
So cute! Fits to size. Washed and dried and retained shape and quality. Soft material

Super cute top, true to size and quality is great! I got the black one and it’s very comfortable!

Love the fit . Love the stretchy lace.

I've been wanting to try this trend and looking for the right piece to incorporate into my wardrobe - this is it! I was worried that these lace/mesh style tops might be itchy or stiff or overall, just uncomfortable, but this long sleeve top from MEROKEETY is so soft, so slinky, so comfy! For me, it's perfect for layering under jumpers, sweaters, cardigans, etc to add a little sexy style. It is a fitted style, so consider that when ordering. Great fun trendy piece!
Nice shirt and decent quality for the price. True to size. Fitted.

Reviewed by spouse:  I have several of these from last year with the mock neck on them, but I really like the crewneck on this better. This burgundy is so pretty in person and really hot for fall/winter 2024. I would say the fit is generous. I am wearing a medium and probably could’ve gotten away with the small and I’ve got rather thick arms for the proportion of the rest of my body. For sizing reference, I’m 130 and 34c.

I love this shirt! It’s adorable and comfortable. It fits a tad bit loose. The material is pretty thin and i feel like i have to be careful with it. This shirt is IN right now. I went to a concert and saw multiple people wearing this!

I am 5'1", measurements 39-33-38.  I normally wear medium, I got medium, and it fit perfectly.  I would have liked the length to be longer, as it goes just under the belly button, but it's fine.  It is a beautiful shirt and very versatile.  The lace is delicate, yet durable, as it snagged on my watch and did not rip.  I also gently tugged it and it was elastic enough to not rip.  The lace does not look cheap, but I think it's more durable than delicate lace.  For the price, this is definitely a steal!
Been looking for a shirt like this for a while and this one did not disappoint. Love the detail and the quality exceeded my expectations. Worth the purchase.
Looks so cute, decent stretch and fits pretty true to size.
Love it
I ordered a large. It fit perfect in the back and chest, the arms had plenty of room and it wasn’t a crop top. It sits right at the bellybutton. The material has stretch so it was comfortable.

评论概述: Perfect to transition clothes for fall
评论详情: This top is exactly what I was looking for to wear under a sleeveless dress to make it more fall-like. It fits exactly as expected and is a great color. It is well-made, but I do hand wash it. If you need something to transition summer clothes to too, this will do the trick.
Great lace top. A must have for any lady's wardrobe whether you decide to wear it as a top or wear it under sweaters and cardigans. It's soft and stretchy. A great buy.
It was exactly as described and fit perfect!
I been loving these tops to wear under vests n bibs. Soft n perfect 👌

评论概述: Lovely Color, Seems sturdy, good details
评论详情: got this for the kiddos prankster pixie sprite costume for halloween ... and wow, its really nice. The color is a brilliant leafy green, very foresty with olive hints. Perfect for us.  The filigree lace work is also rather impressive -- at least to this duh dad. We tried a few different mesh tops and many of them are really meh boring ... or quite subpar in this area. As you can see from the pics, the detailing on this pattern is substantial and quite pretty. Will pop nicely over a black mock turtleneck.  the ruffles around the cuffs and hemline are a great touch and the stitch work on the collar is way sturdier than some other similar items that seem like youre suppose to wear them once (and maybe that's the case with such club gear) ... for my kiddo, as a decorative overlayer, this is a lovely looking piece that will look great with her costume.
Nice fit perfect for fall layers
Highly recommend this lace top. The lace is comfortable & beautiful. I liked it so much I purchased it in white also.

These lace mesh tops are very trendy right now, so I wanted to give one a try. I'm 5'2, slim, and a typical size small. These types of tops usually run small and tight, so I sized up to a medium. Thank goodness I did! I'm not even busty or broad shouldered, but if you are I would definitely recommend going up a size or two. It seems to be good quality. You just have to be careful when you wear or wash it so it doesn't snag on anything. The green is a really pretty color. It'll be perfect for Christmas and football season since I'm a Green Bay Packers fan. I like these tops for spicing up your outfits. It can be paired with jeans, skirts, layered under t-shirts or overalls. It adds some texture and edge that I love! It's definitely worth a try!
